tp.pr5.controller

Class GUIController

  • java.lang.Object
    • tp.pr5.controller.Controller
      • tp.pr5.controller.GUIController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.MenuListener

    public class GUIController
extends Controller
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, javax.swing.event.MenuListener
    The controller employed when the application is configured as a swing application.
    It is responsible for requesting the robot engine start and it redirects the actions performed by the user on the window to the robot engine.
    This class is only visible to package level.
    Author:
    Abel Serrano Juste

    • Constructor Detail

      • GUIController

        public GUIController(RobotEngine model,
             MainWindow window,
             NavigationPanel navigationPanel,
             RobotPanel robotPanel,
             InstructionsPanel instructionsPanel)
        Constructor for the Graphic User Interface Controller
        Parameters:
        model - the model to associate this controller to it.
        window - the main window of the GUI view
        navigationPanel - the panel with the places and the places description.
        robotPanel - the panel with the inventory of the robot
        instructionsPanel - the panel with the instruction buttons for commanding the robot
